item.description:
The temperature hit 90ÂºF on Patriots Day, so it's time to dust off the bike and get out on the bike paths......

The first in a series of social bike rides that will loosely follow a "bike and brews" theme is scheduled for Saturday April 28th at 12 pm. There will be an option of two rides, one consisting of about 13 miles along the Bruce Freeman Bike Trail (http://www.brucefreemanrailtrail.org/), and a longer ride of about 20 miles that will start on the bike trail and then take in some of the sights of Carlisle, MA.

We will meet in the parking lot adjacent to Center Brickyard Pizza in Chelmsford and then bike for a couple of hours before retuning for drinks and pizza.

The group taking the shorter route will ride at about 10-12 mph, and the group going through Carlisle will average 12-15 mph.

Rain date Sunday April 29th.
item.name: Bike and brews....
